0.text:
If you don't have any  more room
or budget to extend your house,

3.text: then consider a timber cabin in the garden

5.text: which can act as an extra useful room.

10.text:
My favorite type of cabin is
the shepherd's hut on wheels.

13.text:
These are made to your requirements
by arts manufacturers across the country.

17.text:
They come ready built and can be
dropped by crane into your back garden.

21.text:
There are a number of reputable
suppliers online,

23.text:
but I recommend visiting a few
in person to get a feel for what you're buying.

26.text:
Plank Bridge, a small company in Dorset,
gifted one to Prince George last year for his birthday.

31.text:
The big plus is that because
they are on wheels,

35.text: you don't need any kind of planning permission.

37.text:
If a decorative shepherd hut is too
fancy for your liking,

40.text:
you can buy a more basic flat
packed in the cabin.

46.text:
Outbuildings can be built
under permitted development rights.

49.text:
They have to be at least 20 meters
away from the property,

51.text:
no more than four meters high
if you're using a pitched roof,

54.text: or 2.5 meters high near a boundary.

57.text:
They also can't cover more than
50 percent of your garden,

60.text:
and need to have a footprint smaller
than ten meters square.

63.text:
How you're going to use the space
makes a difference, too.

66.text:
Under permitted development,
you can't create anything

69.text: that could be used as a new residence.

71.text:
So no bedrooms, kitchen,
or bathroom.

73.text:
Any of these would need
planning permission.

75.text: But, you can create a great games room,

78.text: sauna, craft room, office, or even a man cave.

83.text:
The cost of a beautiful shepherd's hut
is £15-20,000,

86.text:
whereas, the smallest most
basic timber cabin

89.text:
starts from £1500, but could go up
to around £12,000.

93.text: So, does it add value to your home?

95.text:
Well, that all depends on what your
buyer actually wants,

98.text:
and remember, you can take
both models with you when you move.
